LanguageData.CG_SettingDesc_DisableStacking: (CAUTION: May cause unusual behaviour. Leave OFF for maximum stability.) When this setting is ON, colorable items will only stack if they are the same color. OFF for vanilla behaviour - different colors will merge into one stack.
LanguageData.CG_SettingDesc_TannedColors: ON: "leathery" leathers (but not wools or furs) take on a browner, less saturated version of the animal's color. OFF: all leathers inherit the animal's color directly.
